title: Google | L4 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science from Tier 1
Years of Experience: ~5
Prior Experience: SWE at an Investment Bank
Previous CTC: 48L
Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4
Salary: 37.6L
Signing Bonus: 5.5L
Stock bonus: $94K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 15% of salary every year
Other details: Company's PF(1.8)

Accepted the offer.

Could I have negotiated further, I didn't come across any better offers recently for L4 from Google at leetcode or levels.fyi. I had a similar offer from another company but the recruiter mentioned that this is their final offer and this is as high they will go.

Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5167015/Google-or-L4-or-March-2024

title: SDE2 || JioCinema
content:

title: BitGo | E3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech From Tier 3
Years of Experience: 8 years SDE experience
Date of the offer: May 2024
Company: BitGo
Title/Level: E3
Location: Bangalore, India
Base: INR 50 L
Joining: INR 2L
Variable bonus: minimum 10% of Base 
ESOPS: 3200

Total compensation (1st yr): INR 57LPA + 3200 ESOPS
